game.name: Audio
game.desc: Configure audio settings. Choose default of auto, 3.5mm jack, or HDMI. Mixer controls, and apply default settings.

game.name: Bluetooth
game.desc: Register and connect to bluetooth devices. Unregister and remove devices, and display registered and connected devices.

game.name: Configuration Editor
game.desc: Change common RetroArch options, and manually edit RetroArch configs, global configs, and non-RetroArch configs.

game.name: ES Themes
game.desc: Install, uninstall, or update EmulationStation themes. Most themes can be previewed at https://github.com/retropie/ RetroPie-Setup/wiki/themes.

game.name: File Manager
game.desc: Basic ascii file manager for linux allowing you to browse, copy, delete, and move files.

game.name: Retroarch
game.desc: Launches the RetroArch GUI so you can change RetroArch options. Note: Changes will not be saved unless you have enabled the "Save Configuration On Exit" option.

game.name: RetroArch Net Play
game.desc: Set up RetroArch Netplay options, choose host or client, port, host IP, delay frames, and your nickname.

game.name: Run Command Configuration
game.desc: Change what appears on the runcommand screen. Enable or disable the menu, enable or disable box art, and change CPU configuration.

game.name: Freeplay Change Display Driver
game.desc: Choose which display driver to use, between two versions of the experimental driver and the default driver

game.name: Raspi-Config
game.desc: Change user password, boot options, internationalization, camera, add your pi to Rastrack, overclock, overscan, memory split, SSH and more.

game.name: RetroPie Setup
game.desc: Install RetroPie from binary or source, install experimental packages, additional drivers, edit samba shares, custom scraper, as well as other RetroPie-related configurations.

game.name: Freeplay Optimal LCD Settings
game.desc: Switch between optimal LCD settings and HDMI compatibility

game.name: Freeplay Audio Tools
game.desc: Tools to toggle between mono/stereo audio and enable HDMI audio

game.name: Freeplay Brightness Control
game.desc: Control your screen brightness. Persists on reboot.

game.name: Splash Screens
game.desc: Enable or disable the splashscreen on RetroPie boot. Choose a splashscreen, download new splashscreens, and return splashscreen to default.

game.name: WiFi
game.desc: Connect to or disconnect from a wifi network and configure wifi settings.

game.name: Install Temp. Indicator
game.desc: Script to install temperature indicator. If the temperature exceeds 68 degrees, an icon will appear with the degrees the cpu is at.

game.name: Update-Upgrade System
game.desc: Script for Update and Upgrade System automatically

game.name: Update Emulators.cfg
game.desc: Script for Update emulators.cfg

game.name: SRB theme + Launchings
game.desc: Script to install Super Retroboy theme from KALEL1981 and launchings per systems.

game.name: Addons menu update
game.desc: Script to update addons menu.

game.name: Show IP
game.desc: Displays your current IP address, as well as other information provided by the command, "ip addr show."

game.name: Install N64 HD Textures
game.desc: Script to install HD textures used with Mupen64Plus emulator.
